name: notememo
description: A Webapplication which uses HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, EJS, Bootstrap, AJAX, JQuery, Express, API access via HTTPS/GET - Requests, Authentication, Authorization and a lot of more to store Notes for every individual user with a title, content, a quote from a random anime and the date. It is possible to modify the note and filter for notes.
author: sulan-blob
